data.text: Ao Awurade, mefiri mʼakoma nyinaa mu mekamfo wo.
Mɛma mʼani agye na madi ahurisie wɔ wo mu.
Mʼatamfoɔ sane wɔn akyi;
Woadi mʼasɛm ama me, na mɛnya mʼahofadie;
Woatwe amanaman no aso, na woasɛe amumuyɛfoɔ.
Ɔsɛeɛ a ɛnni awieeɛ ato ɔtamfoɔ no,
Awurade di ɔhene daa daa;
Ɔde tenenee bɛbu ewiase atɛn;
Awurade yɛ dwanekɔbea ma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so,
Wɔn a wɔnim wo din no de wɔn ho bɛto wo so,
Monto ayɛyie dwom mma Awurade a ɔte ahennwa so wɔ Sion;
Na ɔkae deɛ ɔtɔ mogya so were no;
Ao Awurade, hwɛ sɛdeɛ mʼatamfoɔ teetee me!
na matumi apae mu aka wʼayɛyie
Aman amanmufoɔ atɔ amena a wɔatu no mu;
Awurade atɛntenenee da no adi;
Amumuyɛfoɔ sane kɔ damena mu,
Nanso ɛnyɛ daa na ne werɛ bɛfiri ohiani,
Sɔre! Ao Awurade, mma ɔdasani nni nkonim,
Hunahuna wɔn, Ao Awurade;
